A1: first AMG Performance Centre in Bengaluru
RelatedSentence: Mercedes - Benz India today inaugurated South India 's first AMG Performance Centre in Bengaluru at Sundaram Motors and also launched the performance SUV - the ML 63 AMG for the Indian market .
Mercedes - Benz India today inaugurated South India 's first AMG Performance Centre in Bengaluru at Sundaram Motors and also launched the performance SUV - the ML 63 AMG for the Indian market .
